```{r getdata, echo = FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(DBI))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(RPostgres))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr))
conn <- dbConnect(RPostgres::Postgres(),
                  dbname = "umar_dd",
                  host = "localhost",
                  port = 5432,
                  user = "postgres",
                  password = Sys.getenv("PG_PG_PSW"))

query <- "SELECT * FROM time_entries WHERE date BETWEEN $1 AND $2"
raw_data <- dbGetQuery(conn, query, params = list(params$start_date, params$end_date))

# Retrieve the employee data from the employees table
query_employees <- "SELECT id, fullname, contract_type, arrival_start, arrival_end, departure_start, departure_end FROM employees"
employees <- dbGetQuery(conn, query_employees)

# Merge the data with the employees table
raw_data <- left_join(raw_data, employees, by = c("user_id" = "id")) |> 
        select(-user_id)

data <- raw_data  |> 
        rename( Datum = date,
                `Ime` = fullname,
                Prihod = start_time,
                Odhod = end_time,
                `Zas. izhod` = break_start,
                `Zas. prihod` = break_end,
                `Prisotnost` = calculated_time,
                contractType = contract_type,
                arrivalStart = arrival_start,
                arrivalEnd = arrival_end,
                departureStart = departure_start,
                departureEnd = departure_end,
                `Odmor min.` = lunch_mins,
                Opombe = notes) |> 
       filter(is_current == TRUE) |> 
        select(-id, -tasks, -is_current, -entry_timestamp) |> 
        relocate(Ime) |> 
        relocate(Opombe, .after = `Odmor min.`) |> 
        arrange(Ime, Datum)
        
dbDisconnect(conn)
```


```{r, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(knitr))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(kableExtra))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(hms))

calculated_hours_background <- ifelse(!is.na(data$contractType) & !is.na(data$Prisotnost) & data$contractType >  as.numeric(as_hms(data$Prisotnost))/3600, "#A10305", ifelse(!is.na(data$contractType) & !is.na(data$Prisotnost) & as.numeric(as_hms(data$Prisotnost))/3600 > data$contractType, "#A10305","black"))

start_time_background <- ifelse(!is.na(data$Prihod) & !is.na(data$arrivalStart) & !is.na(data$arrivalEnd) & (data$Prihod < data$arrivalStart | data$Prihod > data$arrivalEnd),
                                "#A10305", "black")

end_time_background <- ifelse(!is.na(data$Odhod) & !is.na(data$departureStart) & !is.na(data$departureEnd) & (data$Odhod < data$departureStart | data$Odhod > data$departureEnd),
                              "#A10305", "black")

# Remove unwanted columns
final <- data |> 
        select(-contractType, -arrivalStart, -arrivalEnd, 
               -departureStart, -departureEnd, -lunch) |> 
          mutate_all(linebreak) |>  
        mutate(Datum = format(as.Date(Datum), "%d.%m.%y"),
               across(c(Prihod, Odhod, `Zas. izhod`, `Zas. prihod`), ~format(as.POSIXct(., format="%H:%M:%S"), "%H:%M")),
               `Odmor min.` = as.character(`Odmor min.`)) |> 
        tidyr::replace_na(list(Prihod = "", Odhod = "", `Zas. izhod` = "", `Zas. prihod` = "", Prisotnost = "", `Odmor min.` = "", notes = ""))

        

        
# Process the data and generate the admin report table
admin_report_table <- kable(final, format = "latex", escape = FALSE, booktabs = TRUE, longtable = TRUE) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("hold_position", "repeat_header", "striped"))


admin_report_table <- admin_report_table %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "3cm") %>%  # Ime
  column_spec(2, width = "2cm") %>%  # Datum
  column_spec(3, width = "1.5cm") %>%  # Prihod
  column_spec(4, width = "1.5cm") %>%  # Odhod
  column_spec(5, width = "1.5cm") %>%  # Zas. izhod
  column_spec(6, width = "1.5cm") %>%  # Zas. prihod
  column_spec(7, width = "1.5cm") %>%  # Prisotnost
  column_spec(8, width = "1.5cm") %>%  # Odmor min.
  column_spec(9, width = "5cm")  # notes

# Apply conditional formatting to the table
admin_report_table <- admin_report_table %>%
  column_spec(7, color = calculated_hours_background) %>%
  column_spec(3, color = start_time_background) %>%
  column_spec(4, color = end_time_background)

admin_report_table

```
